about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A passionate developer based in Cambodia
about.bio1: Hello! I'm Khom Socheat, a passionate software developer currently studying at CADT. I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and am always eager to learn new technologies.
about.bio2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, reading tech blogs, or working on personal projects. I believe in continuous learning and always strive to improve my skills.
about.name: Name

university.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and Engineering

responsibilities: Developing and maintaining government web applications
Collaborating with team members on software solutions
Implementing modern web technologies and best practices
